# Simple Tut on how to set up DreamCMS#

#first#

1) Download Latest DreamCMS build
2) Extract Everything into your HTDOCS
3) Open Config.php And Change The settings To Your Advantage

File:
<?php
//Start Config Details  //
//Made By GarettMcCarty //

$settings['Mysql']['host']      = 'host'; 
$settings['Mysql']['user']      = 'user';
$settings['Mysql']['pass']      = 'password';
$settings['Mysql']['db']        = 'database';

// If you change this CMS will fail
$settings['key']      = 'Otaku'; Witch Server To Connect To
$settings['liceance'] = '0010-0010-0001-0110'; Free License Key
$settings['loop']     = 'no'; Installer Thing
// If you change this CMS will fail

$settings['sitename'] = 'Sitename';
$settings['language'] = 'en';   Language Code
$settings['server']   = 'phoenix';  Server To Use

$settings['www']      = 'http://google.com'; no '/' your site
$settings['cURL']     = 'no'; If u want to use cURL function gone in later CMS's
$settings['Connect']  = 'passive'; MYSQL connection type
$settings['https']    = 'no'; Force HTTPS on Hotel
$settings['hqhttps']  = 'yes'; Force HTTPS on Housekeeping --> Safer



?>
4) Run Installer.php or install/ ( Decides Witch Version )
5) Enter Your license Key If u have DELTA or SUPER Version
6) Choose Your Version Of Your server In installer
7) Click Run And if Errors CMOD ur Installer to 777
8) Delete Your Installer
9) Love your new habbo Retro
